name: h/\k1ng Th3 L0g0n
description:
Download Fuse or Similar ZX spectrum emulator or run it in the homepage clicking  here : https://archive.org/details/htlflash2

Here a layout of the ZX Spectrum keyboard, you can print it and glue over an old working keyboard, The  Spectrum 128 k keyboard is the second: https://dotneteer.github.io/spectnetide/getting-started/use-keyboard-tool-2

file:htlflash2.z80

Version 2 is out (Improvements Story Telling) at this link: https://archive.org/details/htlst

file: htlst.z80

1 Player version (has a little BUG that when writing something different than a number give you to BASIC)  added at this link: https://archive.org/details/htlP1

file: htlP1.z80

1 Player new additions, Now you have to find the pass and you will have access to the Bash to find access to BASIC.  Recommended by Developer. Here the link to online game : https://archive.org/details/htlp1s2

file: htlp1s2.z80

NB: hint Cli** 

Bash Commands: dir (next Folder) - "Name of Folder" (Next Folder) - .. (Back),

Story Telling

You are an old man, you own a ZX Spectum128k desktop computer where inside it is coded all your life gain (Yep in 8 bit!) it's a program that let go inside your Sinclair BASIC programming language. You have found a bug but your friend accidentally have changed your password. Your only way out is to find that password to correct your so important logon program.
